2093630.name: Knights Crypt
2093630.description:
The land of Altera has been segregated since the great revolution, where the knights order was fractured and evil took hold. Hone your skills as a warrior and elevate your connection to the Aether to fulfil the destiny placed upon you. Explore the vast landscapes of Altera, from the forests to the desert; from the mountains to the planes of the north, find rich details and vivid story telling. Progress through the story of your knight to climb the ranks of the order you are accepted into, become the ruler of your faction and wage war against those that seek to destroy you.
⠀

CRAFT YOUR DESTINY

Born to a rich, royal bloodline, with many great mages in your family, you awake finding yourself in a foreign land, how did you get there? Who knows...
Your bloodline is still touched by the Aether, the life force, flowing through the world, your sensitivity to its power might be the key to the restoration of peace.
You decide your own fate, with your actions moulding the path of the your own story as you build your faction back up to its former glory.

EXPLORE THE KINGDOM

Discover ancient dungeons untouched for hundreds of years, the secrets buried within will further your understanding of communication with the Aether, with ancient scriptures being the only known source of these spells. The vast network of dungeons are inhabited by the evils which appeared, drawn by the chaos unleashed as the citizens of Altera revolted against the cruel royalty that treated them like slaves.
⠀

DISCOVER YOUR POWER

Employ the ancient power granted to the knights order and grow your connection to the Aether, your magic will provide the advantage you need to propel youre faction to greatness. Develop your magic through a tree of abilities, as your character grows more powerful and your connection to the Aether strengthens you will be able to guide your characters development in specific directions.
⠀
